item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume iSCSI Sessions
item_prototype.description: No of sessions that were established and closed so far to this volume.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume Total Read Latency
item_prototype.description: The accumulative latency in milliseconds for read operations on this volume.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume Read IOPS
item_prototype.description: The number of read operations on this volume per second.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume Bps received
item_prototype.description: The data octets per second that were received by the local iSCSI node.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume Bps transmitted
item_prototype.description: The data octets per second that were transmitted by the local iSCSI node.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume Total Write Latency
item_prototype.description: The accumulative latency in milliseconds for write operations on this volume.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume Write IOPS
item_prototype.description: The number of write operations on this volume per second.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume Average Read Latency
item_prototype.description: The average latency in milli seconds for read operations on this volume.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume Average Write Latency
item_prototype.description: The average latency in milli seconds for write operations on this volume.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} Volume {ITEM.LASTVALUE} Used
trigger_prototype.description: More than 90% of a volume is in use
